statements: SELECT * FROM parent_involvement
SELECT parent_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement ORDER BY parent_id DESC
SELECT parent_name, activity_interest FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='High'
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='Low' ORDER BY parent_name ASC
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, activity_interest FROM parent_involvement
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, involvement_level, activity_interest FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='High' ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='Medium' OR involvement_level='Low' ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT parent_name, activity_interest FROM parent_involvement WHERE activity_interest LIKE '%art%' ORDER BY parent_id ASC;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='Medium' AND activity_interest='Sports' ORDER BY parent_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(parent_id), involvement_level FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='High' GROUP BY involvement_level ORDER BY COUNT(parent_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM ParentInvolvement
SELECT parent_name, activity_name FROM ParentInvolvement WHERE parent_id = 1
SELECT activity_name, involvement_level FROM ParentInvolvement ORDER BY involvement_level DESC
SELECT parent_name, activity_name, involvement_level FROM ParentInvolvement WHERE activity_id = 5
SELECT program_name, description, program_date FROM ActivityProgramming
SELECT * FROM ParentInvolvement WHERE involvement_level > 2 ORDER BY parent_name DESC

SELECT activity_name, description FROM ParentInvolvement JOIN ActivityProgramming ON ParentInvolvement.activity_id = ActivityProgramming.activity_id WHERE ActivityProgramming.program_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT parent_name, program_name FROM ParentInvolvement JOIN ActivityProgramming ON ParentInvolvement.activity_id = ActivityProgramming.activity_id WHERE parent_id = 3
SELECT * FROM ParentInvolvement WHERE involvement_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY activity_id
SELECT DISTINCT parent_id, activity_name FROM ParentInvolvement JOIN ActivityProgramming ON ParentInvolvement.activity_id = ActivityProgramming.activity_id
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM volunteer_programs WHERE program_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT parent_id, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement ORDER BY involvement_level DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM volunteer_programs WHERE program_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM parent_feedback WHERE parent_id = 1 AND program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level > 2 ORDER BY parent_id DESC
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM volunteer_programs WHERE program_id IN (1, 3) LIMIT 2
SELECT parent_id, activity_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement JOIN parent_feedback ON parent_involvement.parent_id = parent_feedback.parent_id WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM parent_feedback JOIN volunteer_programs ON parent_feedback.program_id = volunteer_programs.program_id WHERE rating < 2
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM volunteer_programs WHERE program_description LIKE '%community%' ORDER BY program_id ASC
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement;
SELECT parent_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level = 'High';
SELECT activity_name FROM extracurricular_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_activities WHERE involvement_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY parent_id ASC;
SELECT program_name, parent_involvement_goal FROM school_programming WHERE parent_involvement_goal > 50;
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement;
SELECT parent_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level='High';
SELECT activity_name, description FROM extracurricular_activities ORDER BY activity_name DESC;

SELECT parent_name, activity_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement JOIN parent_activities ON parent_involvement.id = parent_activities.parent_id JOIN extracurricular_activities ON parent_activities.activity_id = extracurricular_activities.id;
SELECT program_name, parent_involvement_goal FROM school_programming WHERE parent_involvement_goal > 50 ORDER BY parent_involvement_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement;
SELECT parent_name, activity_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement;
SELECT activity_name, parent_name FROM parent_involvement ORDER BY involvement_level DESC;
SELECT parent_name, activity_name FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level >= 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM parent_involvement;
SELECT * FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level > 5;
SELECT parent_name, activity_name FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT parent_name, activity_name FROM parent_involvement WHERE activity_name LIKE '%volunteer%' ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, activity_name, involvement_level FROM parent_involvement WHERE involvement_level < 4 AND activity_name IN ('Reading Club','Science Fair');

SELECT p.parent_name, a.activity_name, pir.involvement_level FROM parent p JOIN parent_activity_relation pir ON p.parent_id = pir.parent_id JOIN activity a ON pir.activity_id = a.activity_id WHERE pir.involvement_level > 5 ORDER BY pir.involvement_level DESC;
